magpie.data.utilities.generators

Class AlloyingCompositionEntryGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.data.utilities.generators.BaseEntryGenerator
      • magpie.data.utilities.generators.AlloyingCompositionEntryGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<BaseEntry>, Options

    public class AlloyingCompositionEntryGenerator
extends BaseEntryGenerator
    Generate entries by adding alloying elements into a set composition. Incrementally adds more of certain elements into alloy. New compositions are computed by ([old composition])1-x[new element]x where x is the fraction of element added to alloy.

    Usage: <base composition> <max addition> <step size> <elements...>
    base composition: Base composition to be alloyed into
    max addition: Maximum fraction of element to add
    step size: Step size between alloying elements
    elements: Elements to add in
